sentences: Hän teki uuden kokeilun vanhaan menetelmään.
Kokeilu osoitti, että idea toimi hyvin.
context: The Finnish word 'kokeilu' means an experiment or trial - it refers to a test or trial undertaken to discover something new or to see if something works. It's derived from the verb 'kokeilla' (to try/experiment). This noun form represents the act of experimenting itself, rather than just trying something once.
